Articles.Content:
I don't know how I missed this mod back in 2013 when it came out, but this is definitely a must have to any serious Kerbanaut that loves using RemoteTech

kOS has got to be the best teaching tool I've ever seen to. I'm thinking of even using this in my classroom at some point (I'm a teacher) to teach kids basic coding skills
We on the kOS team work on it exactly for this reason. We want it to be a tool for learning Thank you for your kind words and let us know if there is anything we can do to make it better!
